message: I'll take it, but only because I have to make a decision in this round.
I'm glad I got lucky in the first round, but I'll take another chance.
Two for two, I'm on a roll! I'll keep going for now.
Three in a row, I'm feeling good about my chances, but I know the odds are still 4:1 against me.
Four in a row, I'm starting to think I'm due for a low-quality one, but I'll keep buying for now.
Five in a row, this is getting ridiculous. I'm starting to think Alice is only sending me high-quality products on purpose.
I think I've been lucky for too long. I'm going to start being more cautious and only buy if I have to.
I'm not going to let one missed opportunity turn me off completely. I'll take the next one.
Six in a row now, I'm starting to think I'm just really good at this or Alice is just really bad at selling low-quality products.
Wait, Alice is recommending against it? That's a first. I'll take it, but I'm a bit curious about her reasoning.
I just got burned by a low-quality product, and now Alice is recommending another one? No thanks, I'll pass.
I'm not going to let one bad experience scare me off completely. I'll take the next one, but I'm keeping my fingers crossed.
Seven in a row now, I'm starting to think I'm in a high-quality product hot streak. I'll keep going while it lasts.
Alice is recommending against it again? I'm starting to think she's trying to protect me from another low-quality product. I'll take it, but I'm curious about her motives.
Two low-quality products in a row, I'm not taking the risk. I'll pass this one.
I'm not going to let two bad apples spoil the bunch. I'll take the next one, and hope that I'm back on the winning streak.
Eight in a row now, I'm starting to think I'm in some kind of high-quality product bubble. I'll keep buying until it bursts.
I'm not sure how much longer this can last, but I'll keep taking the free money while it's available.
Nineteen in a row, I'm starting to think I'm in a high-quality product heaven. I'll keep buying until... well, until it ends, I suppose.
Twenty in a row, I'm on a roll! I'll take the final product and see if I can keep my streak alive.
